descriptionHtml:
Soo this is my first little Custom Weapon mod so dont be suprised if something isnt as it should be(in that case pls tell me so i can fix it) :D 
you can find the dagger under the steel category at the forge it has a bit higher stat then the daedric one so yeah OP 

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

FIXED RIGHT HAND BUG ENJOY MY FULLY WORKING CUSTOM DAGGER :)
Have Fun!
